Pre-Game Insights: Brazil earned a crucial win away to Chile, keeping them in the automatic qualifying positions.
Brazil's recent results suggest they are almost unheard of with a three-game win streak in 10 competitive fixtures, but their job is under threat.
Brazil have won five straight matches against Peru, providing them with confidence heading into the match.
Peru secured their first win in two years against Uruguay, moving off the bottom of the standings but still five points behind the playoff place.
Peru have struggled offensively, scoring just three goals in their qualifiers so far.
Dorival Junior would be grateful for a more routine success against Peru to improve Brazil's position in the standings.
